name: @chaospad/ngaox-ui
description: small CSS framework used by all chaospad apps.

scripts.start: npm run build-js && npm run build-scss -- --watch
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-scss -- --style=compressed
scripts.build:prod: npm run build && npm run copy-to-dist
scripts.copy-to-dist: cp package.json dist/package.json && cp README.md dist/README.md

author: Raby√¢ Raghib
